A complete ICT solution provider

SQUARE InformatiX Limited; a sister concern of SQUARE Group, one of the leading business house in Bangladesh., has achieved consistent growth over the years expanding its horizon and diversifying its products and services. With its most modern infrastructure and years of experience in dealing with Bangladesh’s best-known organizations, leading businesses and corporate IT departments, Square InformatiX has attained expertise in different sectors including pharmaceuticals, Textile, Healthcare, Garments, Food and Beverage, Cosmetics and Chemicals and Banking. SIL is best placed to help the transition of a business to the new cutting edge technologies.

Square InformatiX is the pioneer in internet and data communication service in Bangladesh. It made the biggest ICT investment, first of its kind in the country, by setting up a satellite earth station(HUB/similar to Teleport) at Savar that facilitates VSAT connectivity across the country without geographical barriers. Square can provide business-grade high-speed connectivity anywhere in the Bangladesh thorough its cutting edge satellite technology. Recently square has introduced maritime VSAT and DSNG solution also. Square InformatiX provides broadband internet service through Fiber, Radio and WiMAX also. Square InformatiX has 24 distributed customer service stations in all major district headquarters across the country. All the services are monitored 24/7 from the central NOC/Help Desk in Mohakhali, Dhaka.

Satellite Service

Square InformatiX Limited is a pioneer in satellite communications service provider in Bangladesh. SIL has a unique infrastructure to serve the requirements of customers globally

Data Communication service (VSAT/Radio/Fiber)

Square InformatiX Ltd is the only company in Bangladesh that provides data communication services through four alternative media including satellite, fiber, radio and wimax with full redundancy.

Software Solution

Software Division of SIL provides world standard software solution to the market. We have qualified software team to provide customized ERP solution and after sales support service 24x7.

Mobile Application

Square InformatiX Limited has the competitive advantage to design the best mobile applications that can surely meet your needs. With most modern infrastructure and years of experience in dealing with big volume sales, thousands of sales representatives and millions of customers.

Web Design and Development

With the growing popularity of Internet, presence on the web has now become inevitable for any business. Here we are to cater to your needs within the budget you have.

Internet Service

Square Informatix provides high-speed Internet service, regardless of geographical location as long as it is within the borders of Bangladesh. From big corporate houses in the capital to small businesses in remote parts of the country.

ICT Managed Service

Square InformatiX Ltd provides ICT managed services to its valued clients as a strategic partner. It includes end-to-end service for transitions, hardware support, systems integration, network monitoring and management of the network infrastructure.

Hardware Trading

Square Informatix Limited is one of the top premier partners of Cisco in Bangladesh. If your company needs any solution related to hardware or network set-up/ optimization, Square is here to help you out.

Data center and DRS solution

The infrastructural strength and also the skilled manpower necessary to build most modern Data Centre and Disaster Recovery Site for your company.

Latest News

  • Square InformatiX Limited Participated in BSHRM 14th Annual General Meeting as a Contributor

    14th Annual General Meeting presented by BSHRM took place on 21st May, 2016, where SQUARE InformatiX Ltd. attended as a contributor. Since it is an Information Communications Technology (ICT) company, SIL went there with HCMS™ (Human Capital Management System) which is software for Human Resource professionals. It was a great time and opportunity to meet numerous HR personnel under the umbrella of BSHRM; who had a lot of query and interest towards our software solution. However at the end of the meeting, there was an election to set new governing body. SQUARE InformatiX Ltd congratulates all of the members of BSHRM and hopes to work with them in near future.

  • Milestone Announcement - Dhaka International Folk Fest

    Milestone Announcement - Dhaka International Folk Fest ...READ MORE

  • One Pharma has choosen SIL as it's Tech Partner

    An Agreement signing ceremony took place on 14th September, 2015 where Mr.Charles CR Patra, MD, Square InformatiX Ltd and KSM Mostafizur Rahman,MD, One Pharma Ltd signed on behalf of respective company.

    Square InformatiX Ltd. will implement “PharmaSIL” ERP software, Wide Area Network & Data Communication service for One Pharma Ltd.

  • SQUARE INFORMATIX LIMITED has been awarded with ISO 9001:2015 certificate

    We are glad to inform you that SQUARE INFORMATIX LIMITED has been awarded with ISO 9001:2015 certificate.
